meanings.definition: The act of partially domesticating an animal or plant.
meanings.sent1: The semidomestications of the wild foxes allowed them to interact with humans to some extent.
meanings.sent2: The process of semidomestications can lead to unique relationships between humans and animals.
meanings.sent3: The semidomestications of the squirrels in the park made them the unofficial mascots of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her semidomestications of the stray cats turned her backyard into a lively sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The semidomestications of the wildflowers in her garden created a beautiful harmony between nature and cultivation.

meanings.sent1: The semidomestications of the feral cats made them more comfortable around humans.
meanings.sent2: The semidomestications of the wolves allowed researchers to study their behavior up close.
meanings.sent3: Living in a cozy barn, the semidomestications of the goats made them the envy of the other farm animals.
meanings.sent4: The semidomestications of the raccoons in the urban area surprised the residents with their adaptability.
meanings.sent5: The semidomestications of the pigeons in the city park created a unique bond between the birds and the visitors.
